attributes.action: Reverse the decision to use £369m of taxpayers money to refurb Buckingham Palace
attributes.background: Theresa May has just granted the Queen a 66% pay rise to fund a £369m 10-year refit of Buckingham Palace. This is an outrageous and unnecessary use of public money considering the cuts which have been made to vital services for the most vulnerable. This decision needs to be reversed immediately.
